author: sriharshakaramchati
content:
**Write your first smart contract using Solidity from scratch in 30 minutes.**

Hello!

I have crafted a 30-minute blog to get you started with Solidity programming language. You will learn to build a smart bank with Solidity that isnâ€™t a toy; Purely for beginners. I'll be guiding you whenever you are stuck.

DM me to get the link to the blog if you are interested. Also, feel free to ask the dumbest of the dumbest questions, I am more than happy to help.
